newsitem.title: USA: U.S. chain store sales unchanged -- BTM/Schroders.
newsitem.headline: U.S. chain store sales unchanged -- BTM/Schroders.

text.p: U.S. chain store sales were unchanged in the week ended June 21 from the prior week, according to the seasonally adjusted BTM/Schroders weekly chain store sales index.
Sales for the week were up 2.8 percent on a year-over-year basis, while the month-to-date index slipped 0.3 percent from the prior month.
"Overall sales were slightly mixed with discounters generally on-to-slightly-above plan while department stores were on-to-slightly-below plan," the report said.
